properties.areaDesc: Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 25 at 9:46AM CST until January 26 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds around 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from
20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20
to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY
